post.title: International Man of Architecture
post.content: My pal Tom – who hosts DevHawk for me – recently set up a traffic analyzer so I can get a better idea about who’s visiting this site. I found it interesting that just under 52% of the visits are coming from the US. Rounding out the top ten DevHawk visitor countries are UK, Canada, Zimbabwe, Australia, Germany, Sweden, China, Netherlands and France. I really dig that almost half my traffic is from outside the US. Plus, it serves as a good reminder that getting good content up on Architecture Center in English means we’re still missing large chunk of the audience.

comments.name: Yves Hanoulle
comments.content: I’m told that today we already have more webpages in chinese then in english…
